techmeme.title: OpenAI sent subpoenas to AI governance nonprofits Encode and CANI, alleging they are part of a conspiracy involving Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, and others (Emily Shugerman/The San Francisco Standard)
Anthropic raised a $13B Series F led by Iconiq, Fidelity, and Lightspeed at a $183B valuation, up from $61.5B in March, and reports a $5B+ run-rate revenue (Anthropic)
Amazon plans to end the ability for Prime members to share free shipping benefits with individuals outside their household, starting on October 1 (Emma Roth/The Verge)
US procurement records show the Trump administration jettisoned a Biden-era order and reactivated an ICE contract for Tel Aviv-based Paragon's spyware (Ryan Gallagher/Bloomberg)
Blockchain-based lender Figure plans to sell 26.3M shares priced between $18 and $20 to raise up to $526.3M in its US IPO, targeting a valuation of ~$4.13B (Reuters)
